short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension for Faceit to see what team a player currently is competing on, designed to mimic how ESEA used to appear.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension modifies a player's profile page to display a section dedicated to what team they are currently a part of. This will allow the user to see what league the any other user competes in, as no other extensions currently fulfill this purpose.
